prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a turtle-like appearance and vibrant blue and green colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines features of a turtle and a dinosaur, with rocky textures on its shell.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by ancient sea creatures, featuring a strong jaw and armored body.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments, showcasing bright colors and a sturdy build.
Show me a powerful Pokemon that embodies resilience and strength, perfect for battling in water.
Make a Pokemon that has both aquatic and terrestrial attributes, with a unique shell design.
Give me a Pokemon that appears friendly yet fierce, with a dynamic color palette of blue and orange.
